page.title: 03Hatfield Complete?
page.content: The town of{Hatfield}has now reached its southernmost limit in terms of development, marked by the line of the A 1001.South of this road the land forms part of the Green Belt.The most recent building has taken place on both sides of Travellers Lane.It is a mixture of council and private developments.To the east of Travellers Lane are{Millwards and St. Audreys {Close.}To the west are{Sandifield, {Brickfield, Far End, Old Leys and {Strawberry Fields. } The latest casualty of the developers is{Five Oaks Guest House,}at the southern end of Travellers Lane. Earlier this year it was demolished and private flats are now being built on the site. There has been some encroachment onto the Green Belt south of the B 1001.Two new buildings have appeared. One is a
